text: Richard Arthur Beckinsale (6 July 1947 â€“ 19 March 1979) was a British actor. Beckinsale was born in Carlton, Nottinghamshire and went to the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art in London. He had starring roles in five sitcoms. They are: The Lovers, Rising Damp, Porridge, its spin-off Going Straight and Bloomers. Beckinsale has two daughters, actresses Samantha and Kate Beckinsale. He died of a heart attack in Sunningdale, Berkshire. == Other websites == * Category:1947 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Actors from Nottinghamshire Category:Alumni of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Berkshire Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
title: Richard Beckinsale
